name: [demo] detailed cooking sim
description:
some precautions of the current build (will fix soon):

  • graphics are currently way larger than intended to be... remember to scroll down to see all the txts
  • Currently it goes automatically fullscreen(f11 to exit)

Commands: 

  • only supporting commands that follows the order of

verb>preposition>noun.

example:

✅ “turn on stove” (valid)

❌ “turn stove on” (invalid)

  • navigation:

“up”: sink

“down”: kitchen
